children.name: HEAL.ME PRIVACY POLICY
Effective Date: Sept. 16, 2024
Heal.me
Inc. (“
Heal.me

,” “we,” “our,” or “us”) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our websites (including H
eal.me

) (our “Sites”), use our mobile applications (our “Apps”), or utilize any of our services (collectively, our “Services”). This Policy applies to both practitioners, treatment providers, instructors, and studio representatives (“Practitioners”) and individual customers seeking services (“Customers”).

By accessing or using our Sites, Apps, or other features of our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our Services.
1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT
1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

We collect personal information that can identify you directly or indirectly as an individual (“Personal Information”). This includes information you provide to us, information collected automatically, and information obtained from third parties.
A. Information You Provide to Us
A. Information You Provide to Us

• Account Registration: When you create an account, we collect your name, email address, phone number, physical address, date of birth, gender, username, password, and payment information. Practitioners may also provide licensure information and upload photos or videos for their profile pages.

Account Registration: When you create an account, we collect your name, email address, phone number, physical address, date of birth, gender, username, password, and payment information. Practitioners may also provide licensure information and upload photos or videos for their profile pages.

• Scheduling and Communications: We collect information related to scheduling appointments and communications between Practitioners and Customers. This includes using your contact information to send appointment confirmations, reminders, and requests for reviews on behalf of Practitioners.

Scheduling and Communications: We collect information related to scheduling appointments and communications between Practitioners and Customers. This includes using your contact information to send appointment confirmations, reminders, and requests for reviews on behalf of Practitioners.

• Appointment Reminders and Review Requests: On behalf of Practitioners, we use your contact information to send you appointment reminders and post-appointment requests for reviews or feedback about the services you received.

Appointment Reminders and Review Requests: On behalf of Practitioners, we use your contact information to send you appointment reminders and post-appointment requests for reviews or feedback about the services you received.
• Contacts and Calendars: With your permission, we may access your contacts and calendar to enhance your experience with our Services.
Contacts and Calendars: With your permission, we may access your contacts and calendar to enhance your experience with our Services.
• Customer Support: When you contact us for support, we collect any information you choose to provide.
Customer Support: When you contact us for support, we collect any information you choose to provide.
• Public Content: Any content you post publicly, such as reviews or questions, may be visible to others.
Public Content: Any content you post publicly, such as reviews or questions, may be visible to others.
• Marketing Communications: If you subscribe to our newsletters or updates, we collect your contact information to send you promotional materials. You can opt-out at any time.
Marketing Communications: If you subscribe to our newsletters or updates, we collect your contact information to send you promotional materials. You can opt-out at any time.
Note:
We do not store payment card information. Payments are processed by third-party providers compliant with industry standards.
B. Information Collected Automatically
B. Information Collected Automatically
• Log Data: We automatically collect information such as IP addresses, browser types, device information, operating systems, and pages viewed when you interact with our Services.
Log Data: We automatically collect information such as IP addresses, browser types, device information, operating systems, and pages viewed when you interact with our Services.
• Location Data: We may collect general geographic location based on your IP address or precise geolocation with your consent when using our Apps.
Location Data: We may collect general geographic location based on your IP address or precise geolocation with your consent when using our Apps.

• Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activities. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activities. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
C. Information from Third Parties
C. Information from Third Parties
• Social Media Platforms: If you interact with us through social media, we may receive information such as your profile details.
Social Media Platforms: If you interact with us through social media, we may receive information such as your profile details.
• Third-Party Services: We may obtain information from other sources and combine it with data we collect.
Third-Party Services: We may obtain information from other sources and combine it with data we collect.
2. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION
2. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION
We use your Personal Information to:
• Provide, maintain, and improve our Services.
Provide, maintain, and improve our Services.
• Process transactions and send related information, including appointment confirmations and reminders.
Process transactions and send related information, including appointment confirmations and reminders.
• Facilitate communications between Practitioners and Customers, including sending requests for reviews after appointments on behalf of Practitioners.
Facilitate communications between Practitioners and Customers, including sending requests for reviews after appointments on behalf of Practitioners.
• Respond to comments, questions, and provide customer service.
Respond to comments, questions, and provide customer service.
• Send administrative information, updates, security alerts, and support messages.
Send administrative information, updates, security alerts, and support messages.
• Personalize your experience and deliver content and product offerings relevant to your interests.
Personalize your experience and deliver content and product offerings relevant to your interests.
• Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service.
Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service.
• Prevent fraudulent activities and ensure the security of our Services.
Prevent fraudulent activities and ensure the security of our Services.
3. HOW WE SHARE YOUR INFORMATION
3. HOW WE SHARE YOUR INFORMATION
We may share your Personal Information with:
• Practitioners and Customers: To facilitate services and communications between users, including appointment reminders and review requests.
Practitioners and Customers: To facilitate services and communications between users, including appointment reminders and review requests.
• Affiliates and Subsidiaries: Within our corporate family for operational purposes.
Affiliates and Subsidiaries: Within our corporate family for operational purposes.
• Service Providers: Trusted third parties that perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, and customer service.
Service Providers: Trusted third parties that perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, and customer service.
• Business Transfers: In connection with mergers, sales, acquisitions, or other corporate transactions.
Business Transfers: In connection with mergers, sales, acquisitions, or other corporate transactions.
• Legal Obligations: To comply with legal processes, enforce our policies, or protect rights, property, and safety.
Legal Obligations: To comply with legal processes, enforce our policies, or protect rights, property, and safety.
• Consent: With your consent or at your direction.
Consent: With your consent or at your direction.
We may also share aggregated or de-identified information that cannot reasonably be used to identify you.
4. COOKIES AND ONLINE TRACKING
4. COOKIES AND ONLINE TRACKING
We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience. You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our Services.
We honor “Do Not Track” signals and do not track or plant cookies when such a mechanism is in place.
5. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES
5. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES

Our Services may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.
6. YOUR CHOICES AND RIGHTS
6. YOUR CHOICES AND RIGHTS
• Access and Correction: You can access and update your Personal Information by logging into your account.
Access and Correction: You can access and update your Personal Information by logging into your account.
• Marketing Communications: You can opt-out of receiving promotional emails by following the unsubscribe instructions in the emails or contacting us.
Marketing Communications: You can opt-out of receiving promotional emails by following the unsubscribe instructions in the emails or contacting us.
• Appointment Communications: If you wish to opt-out of appointment reminders or review requests, you can adjust your preferences in your account settings or contact us.
Appointment Communications: If you wish to opt-out of appointment reminders or review requests, you can adjust your preferences in your account settings or contact us.
• Location Information: You can prevent the collection of precise location data through your device settings.
Location Information: You can prevent the collection of precise location data through your device settings.
• Do Not Track: You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies.
Do Not Track: You can set your browser to refuse all or some browser cookies.
7. DATA SECURITY
7. DATA SECURITY

We are committed to safeguarding your Personal Information and have implemented a comprehensive security program that includes industry-standard administrative, technical, and physical measures designed to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. Our security measures include:
• Encryption: All sensitive data transmitted between your browser and our servers is encrypted using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
Encryption: All sensitive data transmitted between your browser and our servers is encrypted using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols.
• Secure Storage: Personal Information is stored on secure servers with robust firewalls and intrusion detection systems to prevent unauthorized access.
Secure Storage: Personal Information is stored on secure servers with robust firewalls and intrusion detection systems to prevent unauthorized access.

• Access Controls: Access to Personal Information is restricted to authorized personnel who require it to perform their job functions. We employ role-based access controls and enforce strong authentication mechanisms.

Access Controls: Access to Personal Information is restricted to authorized personnel who require it to perform their job functions. We employ role-based access controls and enforce strong authentication mechanisms.
• Data Minimization and Retention: We collect only the information necessary to provide our Services and retain it only as long as required for legitimate business purposes or as required by law.
Data Minimization and Retention: We collect only the information necessary to provide our Services and retain it only as long as required for legitimate business purposes or as required by law.

• Regular Security Assessments: We conduct periodic security audits, vulnerability assessments, and penetration testing to evaluate the effectiveness of our security measures and make improvements as needed.

Regular Security Assessments: We conduct periodic security audits, vulnerability assessments, and penetration testing to evaluate the effectiveness of our security measures and make improvements as needed.

• Employee Training: All employees undergo background checks and receive regular training on data privacy and security best practices to ensure they understand the importance of protecting Personal Information.

Employee Training: All employees undergo background checks and receive regular training on data privacy and security best practices to ensure they understand the importance of protecting Personal Information.
• Secure Development Practices: Our software development processes follow secure coding guidelines, and we perform code reviews and security testing to prevent vulnerabilities.
Secure Development Practices: Our software development processes follow secure coding guidelines, and we perform code reviews and security testing to prevent vulnerabilities.

• Third-Party Security: We carefully select third-party service providers and require them to implement appropriate security measures to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable laws.

Third-Party Security: We carefully select third-party service providers and require them to implement appropriate security measures to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy and applicable laws.

Despite our efforts to protect your Personal Information, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
Your Responsibilities:

• Account Security: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for restricting access to your account. Please choose a strong password and change it periodically.

Account Security: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for restricting access to your account. Please choose a strong password and change it periodically.
• Unauthorized Access: Notify us immediately at support@heal.me if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.
Unauthorized Access: Notify us immediately at
support@heal.me
if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.
8. DATA RETENTION
8. DATA RETENTION

We retain your Personal Information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. When Personal Information is no longer required, we securely delete or anonymize it.
9. CHILDREN’S PRIVACY
9. CHILDREN’S PRIVACY

Our Services are not intended for individuals under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under 16. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected such information, we will take steps to delete it promptly. If you believe we might have any information from a child under 16, please contact us at
support@heal.me
10. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS
10. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS

Your information may be transferred to, stored, and processed in countries other than your own, including the United States, where our servers are located. We take appropriate measures to ensure that your Personal Information receives an adequate level of protection in the jurisdictions in which we process it.
11. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY
11. CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date. Your continued use of our Services after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.
12. CONTACT US
12. CONTACT US
If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us at:
• Email: support@heal.me
Email:
support@heal.me
• Address: Heal.me Inc., 1401 Lavaca Street, Unit 7104, Austin, TX 78701
